members.name: Jay Hajeer
members.title: AI Developer
members.bio: Jay Hajeer is the lead AI Developer at {website.name}, driving the development of ioPilot and ioAI. With expertise in machine learning and content analysis, Jay ensures our platform delivers 90% faster file retrieval and intelligent tagging, empowering creative teams to manage digital assets efficiently.

members.name: Ali Zaidi
members.title: Product Manager
members.bio: Ali Zaidi, Product Manager at {website.name}, oversees the integration of ioHub and ioPortal. His focus on user-centric design ensures seamless connections with AWS, Azure, and Adobe tools, saving teams up to 30 hours weekly on asset management tasks through smart workflows.
